message: Logic doesn't seem to work with these 2 (1 admin).Worst case I will file for RfAr. Wikipda is f'd if we let it be hijacked by a few bullies with agendas. *ALL* the references refer to the lipsta case.

undid edit by 'Arthur Rubin'. The Guardian is a newspaper. The _one_ article you are referring to was written by _one_ person. This alone does not justify the use of the term 'widely discredited'.
There are 24 references.  They can't ALL be Lipstadt; [[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 219878505 by [[Special:Contributions/JackofTradeA|JackofTradeA]] ([[User talk:JackofTradeA|talk]])

Citations should include references to works of a few respectable historians to make the case for "widely discredited"--not ONE.Using your logic Hitler is a 'widely loved' person.I can cite 999+ srcs.
